outputs.output_descr: The Project aims to enhance the transparency and credibility of CSR practices and lay a basis for country level CSR measurement and monitoring systems in selected EU member states: Bulgaria, Hungary, Lithuania, Poland and Slovak Republic.

project_descr: Enhancing Transparency and Credibility of CSR practices through establishment of CSR performance assessment and monitoring systems in new EU Member States
project_title: Establishment of CSR Performance Assessment systems
